content: SFE 2-A12 Multi-head drill driver Subcompact-class 12V multi-head cordless drill driver (offset, right-angle, 13 mm keyless and hex bit holder) for installation work in tight spaces and around corners ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Drill drivers and screwdrivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Four-in-one versatility – interchangeable attachments: offset chuck, right-angle drill driver adapter, 13 mm (1/2”) keyless chuck and hex bit holder Specialized ergonomics – this multi-head drill driver has been engineered to give you the firm grip needed to maintain comfort and control, especially in awkward working positions Equipped for precise work – two bright LEDs, a magnetic bit holder and 15-step clutch are geared towards efficient screw driving while protecting your materials Brushless motor – virtually maintenance-free to minimize tool downtime Applications Everyday drilling and screwdriving in tight spaces – especially for carpentry, plumbing, electrical fixings and installing cabinets ### TECHNICAL DATA: Maximum torque (Soft / Hard Joint): 186 in-lb (soft joint), 301 in-lb (hard joint) No load RPM: gear 1: 400 rpm; gear 2: 1600 rpm Number of gears: 2 Technical Data | Maximum torque (Soft / Hard Joint) | 186 in-lb (soft joint), 301 in-lb (hard joint) | No load RPM | gear 1: 400 rpm; gear 2: 1600 rpm | Number of gears | 2 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 5.2 x 2.7 x 7 in | Tool body weight | 1.5 lb | Rated voltage | 10.8 V ### ITEMS- 3649603 - SFE 2-A12 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SFE 2-A12 Cordl. drill driver - 1x SFE 2-A12 Universal Chuck - 1x Right Angle Attachment Chuck - 1x Offset Angle Attachment Chuck - 1x SFE 2-A12 HEX Chuck - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 2x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x S Soft Pouch - 2241415 - Cordless drill driver SFE 2-A12 box - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SFE 2-A12 Cordl. drill driver - 1x SFE 2-A12 Universal Chuck - 1x Right Angle Attachment Chuck - 1x Offset Angle Attachment Chuck - 1x SFE 2-A12 HEX Chuck
